Full Description: We Cut The Glass, LLC (WCTG) is a company based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, that manufactures and markets the RHYNO Windshield Cutter® – a battery-powered hand tool used to remove laminated glass quickly, safely and easily during emergency, criminal and counter-terrorism operations. The RHYNO was launched to the 1st Responder market in August, 2012 and sold over 600 units in 2013. The current pace is set to sell over 1,500 kits in 2014. The 12-month, average monthly sales is about $40,000/month. WCTG is seeking $500K in funds to support increasing market penetration. 1st Responders like POLICE, FIRE, EMS, FBI, SWAT, Bomb Squads, CIA, Homeland Security, FEMA and other tactical or military groups often must quickly and forcibly remove window glass during emergency, criminal or counter-terrorism operations. Laminated glass is increasingly being used in the windows of all motor vehicles including school buses, motor coaches, tractor trailers, trains, etc... Additionally, many urban, suburban and residential buildings incorporate laminated glass for impact/blast protection, vandalism, soundproofing and UV protection. Former glass-cutting systems employed in this industry are despised by users because they are crude, slow and dangerous. The RHYNO Windshield Cutter® is a 14.4V Lithium-ion, battery-powered impact wrench modified with an aluminum shear head for laminated glass cutting. The shear head has three maximum-hardness tool steel cutting blades; two rigidly fixed with one centered reciprocating cutter blade in between.  This unique design permits safe, single-hand use to remove a motor vehicle windshield in > 1 minute! The complete set includes the RHYNO Windshield Cutter® tool, two rechargeable Lithium-ion batteries, ½ hour, smart battery charger, two suction lifters, one purchase tool, one safety and instruction manual, one cutter blade wrench and a cloth carrying case. Safe, clean and fast, the RHYNO is the solution to this 21st-century problem.
